verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H1732><s%> Judge <S%H8199><s%> me, O LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> have walked <S%H1980><s%> in mine integrity: <S%H8537><s%> I have trusted <S%H982><s%> also in the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> therefore I shall not <S%H3808><s%> slide. <S%H4571><s%>
Examine <S%H974><s%> me, O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and prove <S%H5254><s%> me; try <S%H6884><s%> my reins <S%H3629><s%> and my heart. <S%H3820><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is before <S%H5048><s%> mine eyes: <S%H5869><s%> and I have walked <S%H1980><s%> in thy truth. <S%H571><s%>
I have not <S%H3808><s%> sat <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> vain <S%H7723><s%> persons, <S%H4962><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> will I go in <S%H935><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> dissemblers. <S%H5956><s%>
I have hated <S%H8130><s%> the congregation <S%H6951><s%> of evildoers; <S%H7489><s%> and will not <S%H3808><s%> sit <S%H3427><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>
I will wash <S%H7364><s%> mine hands <S%H3709><s%> in innocency: <S%H5356><s%> so will I compass <S%H5437><s%> thine <S%H853><s%> altar, <S%H4196><s%> O LORD: <S%H3068><s%>
That I may publish <S%H8085><s%> with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thanksgiving, <S%H8426><s%> and tell <S%H5608><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> thy wondrous works. <S%H6381><s%>
LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I have loved <S%H157><s%> the habitation <S%H4583><s%> of thy house, <S%H1004><s%> and the place <S%H4725><s%> where thine honor <S%H3519><s%> dwelleth. <S%H4908><s%>
Gather <S%H622><s%> not <S%H408><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> sinners, <S%H2400><s%> nor my life <S%H2416><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> bloody <S%H1818><s%> men: <S%H376><s%>
In whose <S%H834><s%> hands <S%H3027><s%> is mischief, <S%H2154><s%> and their right hand <S%H3225><s%> is full <S%H4390><s%> of bribes. <S%H7810><s%>
But as for me, <S%H589><s%> I will walk <S%H1980><s%> in mine integrity: <S%H8537><s%> redeem <S%H6299><s%> me, and be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me.
My foot <S%H7272><s%> standeth <S%H5975><s%> in an even place: <S%H4334><s%> in the congregations <S%H4721><s%> will I bless <S%H1288><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
